item.description:
This will be a APL 2 adventure and will be played by RPGA standars. For more info check out www.rpga.com All are welcome regardless of experience. I will have RPGA signup forms with me so you can play on the spot even if you are not in the RPGA. Players are not required to bring anything although Player Handbooks and Spell compendiums would be wise.

It will be a living greyhawk adventure so players can create their characters ahead of time using the standard 28 point ability system. This can be found in the Dungeon Masters Guide or at many online sites. 3.5 Edition

Any guestions?
Email me at armoison@cox.net

Table size is...
1 Judge
Adam Moison
4-6 players
First Come first served basis
item.name: RPGA APL2 at Disposeable Heroes
